name: Taxi Driver Town Simulator
description:
You must be a fan of taxi games and we assume that you're crazy to be a taxi driver .The best taxi driving game is here and it is not just about parking . This taxi game is what you need to become a taxi driver in one of the best 2016 taxi simulator.There are taxi driving games but in this game you have to pick up passengers from the town and drive them safely to their destinations in the limited time.In your taxi cab you can drive faster than in the bus simulator so be careful! Master your driving skills in one of the best 2016 taxi games!

Download Now
